testcase.name: Search A Product
testcase.system-out: Given I have a search field in the Amazon page..............................passed When I search for Product "Apple MacBook Pro" and the price 1000............passed Then Product Name with the "Apple MacBook Pro" should be displayed..........passed

testcase.name: Booking Cab
testcase.system-out: Given User wants to select the car type "Sedan" From Uber App...............passed When User selects car "Sedan" and pick up point as "Bangalore" and drop "Pune".passed Then Driver starts the journey..............................................passed And Driver ends the journey.................................................passed Then User Pays 1000 USD.....................................................passed
